com.stremebase.field

Class TupleField<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.stremebase.dal.Field<T>
      • com.stremebase.field.TupleField<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The common superClass of all stores classes, such as Object

    public class TupleField<T>
extends Field<T>
    The field to store a tuple of values
    Author:
    olli

      • createOrGet

        public long createOrGet(int index,
                        Object value)
        Generates new key and sets the value, but only if the value is not associated with any existing key
        Parameters:
        index - the index
        value - the value
        Returns:
        the key that is associated with the value so that existing key is returned as negative value and created key as positive value

      • set

        public void set(long key,
                T... values)
        Sets multiple values for a key at once
        Parameters:
        key - the key
        values - the values, starting from index 0

      • queryWithIndex

        public LongStream queryWithIndex(int cellIndex,
                                 T lowestValue,
                                 T highestValue)
        A helper function to generate a result stream for table query from index
        Parameters:
        cellIndex - index of the value
        lowestValue - lowest value to accept
        highestValue - highest value to accept
        Returns:
        the stream of matching keys
